html:
Dec 21 (Reuters) - Securities analysts revised their ratings and price targets on several European companies, including Enersense International, Premier Oil and Tikkurila, on Monday.


HIGHLIGHTS

* Airtel Africa AAF.L: Citigroup cuts to neutral from buy; raises PT to 75p from 65p

* DS Smith SMDS.L: Citigroup raises price target to 427p from 377p

* Enersense International ESENSE.HE: Inderes cuts to increase from buy

* Premier Oil Plc PMO.L: Berenberg cuts to sell from hold

* Tikkurila TIK1V.HE: Inderes cuts to reduce from increase

Following is a summary of research actions on European companies reported by Reuters on Monday. Stock entries are in alphabetical order.


* Acerinox SA ACX.MC: Citigroup raises price target to EUR 10 from EUR 8.5

* Airtel Africa AAF.L: Citigroup cuts to neutral from buy; raises PT to 75p from 65p

* Aj Bell AJBA.L: RBC initiates with sector perform rating; price target 435p

* Anglo American AAL.L: Morgan Stanley cuts target price to 2700p from 2780p

* Aperam SA APAM.AS: Citigroup raises price target to EUR 38 from EUR 30

* Applus APPS.MC: Kepler Cheuvreux raises target price to EUR 11.1 from EUR 9.5

* Aroundtown SA AT1.DE: Deutsche Bank raises target price to EUR 8.5 from EUR 7.8

* Bayer AG BAYGn.DE: Baader raises target price to EUR 56.1 from EUR 55.3

* Deutsche Euroshop AG DEQGn.DE: Deutsche Bank raises target price to EUR 19 from EUR 16

* DS Smith SMDS.L: Citigroup raises price target to 427p from 377p

* Electrolux ELUXb.ST: JP Morgan cuts target price to SEK 205 from SEK 210

* Enersense International ESENSE.HE: Inderes cuts to increase from buy

* Enersense International ESENSE.HE: Inderes raises target price to EUR 9.0 from EUR 6.5

* Etteplan Oyj ETTE.HE: Evli raises target price to EUR 12.4 from EUR 9.3

* Evraz EVRE.L: BCS Global Markets Increases PT to GBP 5.5 from GBP 4.1; keeps hold

* Flutter Entertainment Plc FLTRF.L: Peel Hunt raises target price to 13,100p from 12,600p

* Hargreaves Lansdown HRGV.L: RBC starts with outperform rating; 1820p target price

* Honeycomb Investment Trust Plc HONY.L: Jefferies cuts to hold from buy

* JD Sports JD.L: RBC raises price target to 900p from 825p

* Kering PRTP.PA: Citigroup cuts price target to EUR 641 from EUR 650

* Kone Oyj KNEBV.HE: JP Morgan cuts target price to EUR 74 from EUR 75

* Leg Immobilien AG LEGn.DE: Deutsche Bank raises target price to EUR 145 from EUR 135

* Outokumpu Oyj OUT1V.HE: Citigroup raises price target to EUR 3.5 from EUR 2.6

* Petrofac PFC.L: Jefferies cuts target price to 170p from 200p

* Premier Oil Plc PMO.L: Berenberg cuts target price to 17p from 18p

* Premier Oil Plc PMO.L: Berenberg cuts to sell from hold

* Reckitt RB.L: Deutsche Bank cuts target price to 8200p from 8400p

* Restaurant Group RTN.L: JP Morgan Rolls Forward dec-21 PT of 104p vs dec-20 PT of 110p

* Revenio Group REG1V.HE: Inderes raises target price to EUR 44.0 from EUR 36.0; reduce

* Safran SAF.PA: Berenberg cuts target price to EUR 130 from EUR 140

* Sainsbury SBRY.L: Credit Suisse cuts target price to 270p from 270.23p

* Senior Plc SNR.L: JP Morgan raises target price to 70p from 66p

* SSP Group Plc SSPG.L: Citigroup raises price target to 420p from 290p

* Stillfront Group AB (Publ) SFRG.ST: Kepler Cheuvreux raises PT to SEK 1150 from SEK 1100

* Tikkurila TIK1V.HE: Inderes cuts to reduce from increase

* Tikkurila TIK1V.HE: Inderes raises target price to EUR 25.0 from EUR 15.5

* Travis Perkins TPK.L: Citigroup raises price target to 1510p from 1430p

* TUI AG TUIT.L: Berenberg cuts target price to 250p from 350p

* Wienerberger AG WBSV.VI: Kepler Cheuvreux raises target price to EUR 28 from EUR 26

* WM Morrison MRW.L: Credit Suisse cuts target price to 216p from 216.17p

* Wulff Yhtiot WUF1V.HE: Inderes raises target price to EUR 3.50 from EUR 3.20; increase


(Compiled by Bengaluru Newsroom)
